data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
In the minute 2, Nagoya to take a throw-in in Sendai territory.
Nagoya needs to be cautious. Sendai have an attacking throw-in.
Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
In the minute 4, Nobutsugu Murakami awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
Throw-in for Nagoya in their own half.
In the minute 8, Throw-in Nagoya.
Sho Inagaki (Nagoya) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Nagoya in the half of Sendai.
In the minute 11, Can Nagoya get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sendai's half?
Throw-in for Nagoya at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a throw-in for Sendai, close to Nagoya's area.
In the minute 13, Sendai attack but Shun Nagasawa's header doesn't find the target.
Nagoya have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Nagoya is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 15, It's a goal kick for the away team in Nagoya.
Mateus for Nagoya drives towards goal at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Sendai awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 19, Nagoya pushes forward through Naoki Maeda, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Nagoya.
Nagoya are pushing forward but Hiroyuki Abe's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 19, Nobutsugu Murakami awards Sendai a goal kick.
Nagoya awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Sendai at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
In the minute 21, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Sendai at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 23, Nagoya awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sho Inagaki of Nagoya gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Sendai at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
In the minute 24, Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a Sendai throw-in in Nagoya's half.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Nagoya are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Corner awarded to Nagoya.
In the minute 33, Nobutsugu Murakami awards Sendai a goal kick.
Ball safe as Sendai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sendai are whistled for offside.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Sendai in the half of Nagoya.
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Nagoya.
In the minute 38, Free kick Sendai.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Nagoya in their own half.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Sendai at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a Sendai throw-in in Nagoya's half.
Nagoya's Mu Kanazaki attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 43, Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
Can Sendai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nagoya's half?
Sendai have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Ball safe as Sendai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Nagoya.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the away team in Nagoya.
The first half has been concluded at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 47, Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
Sendai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nagoya to take a throw-in in Sendai territory.
In the minute 48, Corner awarded to Nagoya.
Throw-in for Sendai in their own half.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 50, Hiroyuki Abe gets his shot on target but fails to score for Nagoya.
Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
Nagoya are coming forward and Shumpei Naruse gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 50, Nobutsugu Murakami awards Sendai a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Nagoya goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Sendai in Nagoya.
In the minute 53, Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Sendai.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nagoya.
Nagoya to take a throw-in in Sendai territory.
In the minute 55, Nobutsugu Murakami awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Nagoya at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
In the minute 56, In Nagoya Nagoya drive forward through Mateus. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Sendai have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Nagoya in the half of Sendai.
In the minute 60, Throw-in Nagoya.
Nagoya's Mu Kanazaki misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Sendai at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
In the minute 62, Ball safe as Sendai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Nagoya get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sendai's half?
Can Nagoya capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sendai's half?
Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
In the minute 64, Nagoya make their first substitution with Yuki Soma replacing Naoki Maeda.
Massimo Ficcadenti (Nagoya) is making a second substitution, with Ryogo Yamasaki replacing Hiroyuki Abe.
In the minute 65, Corner awarded to Nagoya.
Sho Inagaki scores to make it 1-0 at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a Nagoya throw-in in Sendai's half.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Nagoya in the half of Sendai.
Sendai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Sendai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nagoya's half?
The away team have replaced Takumi Sasaki with Isaac Cuenca. This is the first substitution made today by Takashi Kiyama.
In the minute 69, The away team replace Hisashi Appiah Tawiah with Ryutaro Iio.
Sendai have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
In the minute 71, Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Nagoya have a goal kick.
Free kick for Sendai in the half of Nagoya.
In the minute 75, Sendai are pushing forward but Takuma Hamasaki's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Nagoya goal kick.
Nagoya drives forward and Mu Kanazaki gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 77, Corner awarded to Nagoya.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a Nagoya throw-in in Sendai's half.
Nagoya to take a throw-in in Sendai territory.
Hiroto Yamada is on a sub for Kunimitsu Sekiguchi for Sendai.
In the minute 78, Shuhei Akasaki is replacing Shun Nagasawa for Sendai at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Throw-in for Nagoya in their own half.
In the minute 80, Mu Kanazaki of Nagoya smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 82, Ball safe as Sendai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nagoya's Yuki Soma is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in Sendai.
In the minute 83, Sendai awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Nagoya in their own half.
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 85, Takashi Kiyama is making the team's fifth substitution at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium with Wataru Tanaka replacing Takuma Hamasaki.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards the away team a throw-in.
Sendai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 88, Can Nagoya capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Goal kick for Sendai at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Massimo Ficcadenti is making the team's third substitution at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium with Kazuya Miyahara replacing Mu Kanazaki.
In Nagoya a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Nagoya.
Corner awarded to Nagoya.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Nagoya.
Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nagoya.
Nagoya have a dangerous throw-in.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-0.
